text: Adam Roman Żurowski (3 March 1929 – 25 March 2016) was a Polish surveyor. He was the professor of technical sciences at the Gdansk University of Technology. He was also Dean of the Faculty Hydrotechnics from 1990 through 1993. He was Head of the Department of Geodesy from 1985 through 1999. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Polish scientists Category:Polish academics Category:People from Lviv
title: Adam Żurowski
